name: reldmnmhm

stmt.origin: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cnmhm, cnlm, cnlm, cin(co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cnghm, cv(hs1))))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cnmhm))
-| wceq(cnmhm, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cnlm, cnlm, cin(co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cnghm, cv(hs1)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, cnlm)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(NMHom))
⊣ NMHom =(hs0 ∈ NrmMod, hs1 ∈ NrmMod ↦((hs0[LMHom]hs1)⋂(hs0[NGHom]hs1)))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, NrmMod)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cnmhm))
-| wceq(cnmhm, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cnlm, cnlm, cin(co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cnghm, cv(hs1)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, cnlm)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(NMHom))
⊣ NMHom =(hs0 ∈ NrmMod, hs1 ∈ NrmMod ↦((hs0[LMHom]hs1)⋂(hs0[NGHom]hs1)))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, NrmMod)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cnmhm, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cnlm, cnlm, cin(co(cv(hs0), clmhm, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cnghm, cv(hs1)))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
body.pretty:
⊢ NMHom =(hs0 ∈ NrmMod, hs1 ∈ NrmMod ↦((hs0[LMHom]hs1)⋂(hs0[NGHom]hs1)))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)

comment: Lemma for module homomorphisms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)
